      • getGsonConverter

        protected retrofit.converter.GsonConverter getGsonConverter()
        Description copied from class: AbstractAPIClient
        Returns a GsonConverter, which can be used by retrofit. Create a GSON with a builder, then use GsonConverter(GSON).
        Specified by:
        getGsonConverter in class AbstractAPIClient<Building>
        Returns:
        An object, which converts JSON to the correct Java objects.
